message.entry: TiffAdapter expects 4 arguments when Mode is ''w''.
Input size must be an MxN or MxNx3 vector.
TiffAdapter does not support writing ''{0}'' datatype.

The TiffAdapter class cannot write to compressed TIFF images. Opening the adapter in read-only mode. See the documentation for IMWRITE or the Tiff class for information on creating uncompressed TIFF images.

The TiffAdapter class cannot write to TIFF images with the ''Separate'' PlanarConfiguration tag. Opening the adapter in read-only mode. See the documentation for the Tiff class for more information on Tiff tags.

The TiffAdapter class cannot write to TIFF images with the ''YCbCr'' Photometric tag. Opening the adapter in read-only mode. See the documentation for the Tiff class for more information on Tiff tags.
Error reading from TiffAdapter. Region size exceeds image bounds.
Attempted to write to a read-only TiffAdapter.
Error writing to TiffAdapter. Data will exceed image bounds.
TiffAdapter only supports creating 1 or 3 channel images.
Datatype not supported by TIFF format handler.
TiffAdapter: Data size should match the file dimensions.
